props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by asChild.

props.name: asChild
props.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description:
The value of the menu item that should be active when initially rendered.

Use when you do not need to control the value state.

props.name: delayDuration
props.description: The duration from when the pointer enters the trigger until the tooltip gets opened.

props.name: dir
props.description:
The reading direction of the combobox when applicable.

If omitted, inherits globally from ConfigProvider or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

props.name: disableClickTrigger
props.description: If true, menu cannot be open by click on trigger

props.name: disableHoverTrigger
props.description: If true, menu cannot be open by hover on trigger

props.name: disablePointerLeaveClose
props.description: If true, menu will not close during pointer leave event

props.name: modelValue
props.description: The controlled value of the menu item to activate. Can be used as v-model.

props.name: skipDelayDuration
props.description: How much time a user has to enter another trigger without incurring a delay again.

props.name: unmountOnHide
props.description: When true, the element will be unmounted on closed state.
